Abilities.name: Slash
Abilities.description: Attack your foe with a large slashing motion. Deals extra damage if weapon is equipped

Abilities.name: Build A door
Abilities.description: Build a door from scratch to reduce incoming enemy attack damage

Abilities.name: Fireball
Abilities.description: You somehow conjure up a fireball from your palms and fire it.

Abilities.name: Hyper Accurate Laser Beam
Abilities.description: A high precision laser beam fires from your fingers. Neva miss.

Abilities.name: Not so accurate laser beam
Abilities.description: Supa powerful beam, but I nerf accuracy just cause I can.

Abilities.name: Really run like hell
Abilities.description: I can guarentee this aint no spell, but you will outrun everyone.

Items.name: Health Potion
Items.description: A mystical potion that rejuvenates your health points.

Items.name: Stat Potion
Items.description: A mystical potion that adds a point to a random stat.

Items.name: Armor
Items.description: Incredible high precision crafting by Rick Sanchez himself.

Weapons.name: Dirk
Weapons.description: A common sword used for dungeon exploration. It looks heavily used.

Weapons.name: Bow
Weapons.description: A bow used for long ranged attaks. There are no arrows.. Wait what?..

Weapons.name: Spear
Weapons.description: A Stick with a razor sharp edge. It's not that hard to make right?

Weapons.name: Spellbook
Weapons.description: Oh my, thats a lot of pages, you sure you're going to read all that?

Weapons.name: Paddle
Weapons.description:
A heavy damage melee device that has a wide surface area 
 to inflict maximum damage upon its unfortunate victims
 however, it will only have 0% if you are never given one
